      • drawOverlay

        public void drawOverlay(EnvironmentTile startTile,
                        int mp,
                        boolean draw,
                        java.lang.String playerId)
        Draws an overlay onto the map, showing tiles to possibly move to and to attack.
        Parameters:
        startTile - The tile from which the paths are calculated.
        mp - The available movement points.
        draw - Indicates whether the overlay should be actually drawn or just calculated.
        playerId - The id of the player currently interacts.

      • leaveGame

        public void leaveGame(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        (Optionally) leaves the game, differentiating between three ways: click on "back", on "concede & yes" or "concede & no".
        Parameters:
        event - The click's source.
